thread.title: Joyce Assad

author: Joyce Assad
title: Joyce Assad
text:
Philip is a person who enjoys traveling, and therefore, he DOES understand what a traveler and a tourist would like to hear, sense and experience. He has an 'eye' to people and their personalities, and accordingly, he tailors his behaviour and tours. He is like a mine of diamonds â€¦ you have to dig, to get the diamonds out. So, please ASK him anything .. you will be amazed with his vast knowledge, and friendly personality.
As for the sites we visited, it deserved every bit of our time.
